meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Emily Gifford Dave Burnstein Evan Sandman Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6237.

td.p: Emily Gifford, a historical researcher and writer from Middletown, Connecticut
Dave Burnstein, an attorney from Louisville, Kentucky
Evan Sandman, a hotel front desk manager from Los Angeles, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $28,801)

tr.td: BALLET IT ON THICK
HANDGUNS
NATIONAL FOOD DAYS
HUSBANDRY
A LOT OF HAPPY TALK
WORDS CONTAINING BODY PARTS

tr.td: Evan
Dave
Emily
DESIGNING WOMEN
THE FACTS OF LIFE
ST. ELSEWHERE
CHEERS

(Alex: You have to name the royal dynasty.)
BACK TO '80s TV
